name: get_litecoin_block_hash
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool litecoin_wallet.
Tool description: litecoin blockchain wallet that support creating wallets & addresses, sending and receiving Litecoins and many more!
API description: Fetches the hash of a Litecoin block by its index using the RapidAPI service.

i.description: The index of the Litecoin block.
